```{r}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)

url <- 'https://api.opencovid.ca/timeseries?stat=cases&loc=prov&date=01-09-2020'
```

```{r}
get_link <- GET(url)
json_data <- content(get_link, as  = "parse")
data.frame(json_data$cases[[2]])
```
